Description: Rim sherd of Chian pottery Type B kantharos; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; two pairs of added white bands; exterior reserved; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: Many kantharoi Type B (See Williams 1983, 169) have painted inscriptions beneath the rim and several have been found on Aegina as well as at Naukratis. Williams, D. ‘Aigina, Aphaia-Tempel 5. The pottery from Chios’, Archäologischer Anzeiger 1983. There is some pitting on the exterior surface.
Bibliographic references: Cook & Woodhead 1952 / Painted Inscriptions on Chiot Pottery (p. 169, no. 182)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 730, no. 907)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1710) (phase 2)
